sentences.sContent: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.sCn: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

sentences.sContent: The taxi drew up in front of the Riviera Club.
sentences.sCn: 该出租车在里维埃拉俱乐部前停了下来。

phrases.pCn: 乘出租车，搭出租车；打的
出租车旅行；乘坐出租车
出租汽车服务；叫车服务；出租车调度站

words.tran: 滑行道；[航] 飞机滑行道

trans.tranCn: 滑行；乘出租车；用出租车送
trans.tranOther: if a plane taxis, it moves along the ground before taking off or after landing
a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere
